altTitles.en: もっと淫らに躾ましょう

description.en:
1) That's A Secretary's Job  
Whenever college student Shirou gets in trouble, his father's secretary Kawata is sent to deal with him. But Kawata's punishments are all sexual.   
  
2) Let's Train More Lewdly  
Kawata is being cold towards Shirou.   
  
3) A Greedy Right Hand  
A young tutor gets involved with his student.  
  
4) Fascinating Counselling  
Miyamoto the psychologist has a patient that seems to imagine Miyamoto and him are lovers. The patient even goes as far as describing their imaginary love making!  
  
5) 10 Million Dollar Lover  
Jirou sees a sad man wandering the streets in the rain and invites him over. After a year of living together, the man's secrets are finally revealed.  
  
6) I Love You Firmly Bound  
23 year old Tatshuhiko likes to fantasize about S&M and one day his 17 year old cousin, Makoto, discovers his secret.  
  
7) The Secret Love Affair in the Secretary's Office  
Shirou gets more than he bargained for.  
  
(Source: MU)
